data.comment: Today's referee, Lawrence Visser, has blown to start the match.
It seems as if Mamadou Fall is unable to continue. Saido Berahino replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 26, At Stade du Pays de Charleroi, Saido Berahino has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second half has started at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
In the minute 70, Anderlecht make their first substitution with Mustapha Bundu replacing Paul Mukairu.
Vincent Kompany (Anderlecht) is making a second substitution, with Antoine Colassin replacing Percy Tau.
The home team replace Saido Berahino with Massimo Bruno.
In the minute 83, Steeven Willems (Charleroi) gets a yellow card.
Lukasz Teodorczyk is replacing Amine Benchaib for the home team.
Lukasz Teodorczyk is booked for the home team.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ali Gholizadeh.
Ryota Morioka instrumental with a fine assist.
